721433f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, east side, at 7lst Street, showing St. James Protestant Episcopal Church, erected on this site in 1884. Since that time a few alterations, such as the addition of the belfrey, have been made.
On the S.E. corner of 71st Street is the clearing resulting from demolition of the old Presbyterian Hospital. The Presbyterian Nurses' Home is shown on the north side of 71st Street, adjoining
the church.
June 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

721434f-a.text:
Madison Avenue, west side, at 71st Street. In foregIOund may be seen Presbyterian Hospital, which has just been wrecked. On N.E. corner of 71st Street is St. James Episcopal Church.
June 8, 1928.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.

1557968-a.title: 865 Madison Avenue - East 71st Street
